query: SELECT id, personaId, sourceType, title, LEFT(content, 200) as content_preview, LENGTH(content) as content_length, createdAt FROM knowledge_bases WHERE sourceType IN ('webpage', 'webpage_llm') ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT 20;
